(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (PRP$ My) (NN wife))
    (VP (VBZ insists)
      (SBAR (IN that)
        (S
          (NP (PRP I))
          (VP (VBP need)
            (S
              (VP (TO to)
                (VP (VB blog)
                  (NP (DT this) (JJ particular) (NN lontong))
                  (SBAR (IN because)
                    (S
                      (NP (PRP it))
                      (VP (VBZ is)
                        (PP (IN in)
                          (NP (PRP$ her) (NNS words)))
                        (`` ``)
                        (S
                          (VP (TO to)
                            (VP (VB die)
                              (PP (IN for))))
                          ('' ''))))))))))))
    (. .)))


poss(wife-2, My-1)
nsubj(insists-3, wife-2)
root(ROOT-0, insists-3)
mark(need-6, that-4)
nsubj(need-6, I-5)
ccomp(insists-3, need-6)
aux(blog-8, to-7)
xcomp(need-6, blog-8)
det(lontong-11, this-9)
amod(lontong-11, particular-10)
dobj(blog-8, lontong-11)
mark(is-14, because-12)
nsubj(is-14, it-13)
advcl(blog-8, is-14)
prep(is-14, in-15)
poss(words-17, her-16)
pobj(in-15, words-17)
aux(die-20, to-19)
xcomp(is-14, die-20)
prep(die-20, for-21)

  (FRAG
    (PP (IN Yeah))
    (, ,)))


root(ROOT-0, Yeah-1)


(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (PRP she))
    (VP (VBZ 's)
      (VP (VBN been)
        (VP (VBG going)
          (PP (IN on)
            (NP
              (NP (RB about) (DT this) (NN lontong))
              (PP (IN for)
                (NP (NNS months))))))))
    (. .)))

pobj(on-5, lontong-8)
prep(lontong-8, for-9)
pobj(for-9, months-10)


(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (PRP She))
    (VP (VBZ has)
      (NP (PRP it))
      (PP (IN for)
        (NP
          (NP (NN breakfast))
          (ADJP (RB almost) (DT every)))
        (NP (NNP Saturday)))
      (PP (IN without)
        (S
          (VP (VB fail)
            (ADVP (RB just))
            (PP (IN before)
              (S
                (VP (VBG doing)
                  (NP (PRP$ her) (JJ weekly) (NN grocery) (NN shopping)))))))))
    (. .)))

      (VP (VBD ended)
        (PRT (RP up))

          (VP (VBG going)
            (S
              (NP (EX there))
              (ADJP (JJ mid-week)
                (S
                  (VP (TO to)
                    (VP (VB get)
                      (NP (PRP$ her) (VBG lontong) (NN fix)))))))))))
    (. .)))

(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (PRP$ My) (NN wife))
    (VP (VBZ insists)
      (SBAR (IN that)
        (S
          (NP (PRP it))
          (VP (VBZ is)
            (UCP
              (NP (SYM a))
              (CC and)
              (ADVP (DT all)))))))
    (PRN
      (NP (PRP you))
      (VP (VBZ husbands)
        (PRT (RP out))
        (NP
          (NP (RB there))
          (PRN (-LRB- -LRB-)

              (WHNP (WP who))
              (S
                (VP (VBP wish)
                  (S
                    (VP (TO to)
                      (VP (VB enjoy)
                        (NP (DT a) (JJ peaceful) (NN existence))))))))

              (VP (MD would)
                (VP (VB agree)

                      (NP (PRP it))

                          (VP (TO to)

                              (VP

    (`` ``)))

(ROOT
  (S
    (VP (VB Have)
      (VP (RB not)
        (ADVP (RB really))
        (VBN looked)
        (PP (IN into)
          (NP
            (NP (NNP Singapore) (POS 's))
            (ADJP (RBS most) (JJ famous)
              (CC and)
              (JJ tastiest))
            (NN lontong)))
        (SBAR (CC but)
          (S
            (NP (PRP I))
            (VP (VBP have)
              (S
                (VP (TO to)
                  (VP (VB say)
                    (SBAR (IN that)
                      (S
                        (NP (DT this) (NN one))
                        (VP (VBZ is)
                          (ADJP (JJ good) (RB enough)
                            (S
                              (VP (TO to)
                                (VP (VB be)
                                  (VP (VBN included)
                                    (PP (IN in)
                                      (NP (PDT such) (DT a) (NN list)))))))))))))))))))
    (. .)))


aux(looked-4, Have-1)
neg(looked-4, not-2)
advmod(looked-4, really-3)
root(ROOT-0, looked-4)
prep(looked-4, into-5)
poss(lontong-12, Singapore-6)
possessive(Singapore-6, 's-7)
advmod(famous-9, most-8)
amod(lontong-12, famous-9)
cc(famous-9, and-10)
conj(famous-9, tastiest-11)
pobj(into-5, lontong-12)
cc(have-15, but-13)
nsubj(have-15, I-14)
ccomp(looked-4, have-15)
aux(say-17, to-16)
xcomp(have-15, say-17)
mark(good-22, that-18)
det(one-20, this-19)
nsubj(good-22, one-20)
cop(good-22, is-21)
ccomp(say-17, good-22)
advmod(good-22, enough-23)
aux(included-26, to-24)
auxpass(included-26, be-25)
xcomp(good-22, included-26)
prep(included-26, in-27)
predet(list-30, such-28)
det(list-30, a-29)
pobj(in-27, list-30)
